thread.title: James Willard

author: James Willard
title: James Willard
text: I'm getting ready to DJ my 50th high school reunion, and I just ordered a ton of CD's from OLDIES.com. The songs are great, and the prices were fantastic! They were packed well, and shipped FAST! They also combined shipping to save me even more money. Everything about this music outlet is Top Shelf. I couldn't be more pleased. You must have a very good staff working there. Thank You very much! Sincerely, Jim Willard
